name: @pluginsdotdev/plugin
description: Plugins.dev lets you allow users to safely add 3rd party plugins to your site. This is the package for plugins.
author: Adam Berger <adam@plugins.dev>

scripts.link: rm -rf node_modules && mkdir -p 'node_modules/@pluginsdotdev' && for m in react react-dom '@pluginsdotdev/bridge'; do ln -f -s "$(pwd)/../../node_modules/${m}" node_modules/${m}; done
scripts.test: npm run link && tsc --module commonjs && rollup --config rollup.config.ts && npx jest
scripts.build: tsc --module commonjs && npm run gen-flow-types && rollup --config rollup.config.ts
scripts.build-docs: typedoc --out docs --target es6 --theme minimal --mode file src
